context: Does this version (the physical PC version) require Origin or Steam?
response: It requires an Origin account

context: Do the graphics differ depending on different consoles?
response: Yes but not by design.  Different consoles and tv's provide varying resolutions of the game graphics. The character will be the same on any console. However how clear the detail is and the colors will differ. Even on two consoles of the same kind. (Because tv is different)

context: What games are actually on this ? is there Gravity Tiles and Majong and Backgammon etc.????
response: The version I have (2007/2008) has the games you ask about plus 24 more, some very good and some not so. Double crossword game is very good, plus the slide tile game is a real favorite. Well worth the money for these games.

context: Does this headset require batteries or charging? It's not wireless, right? So if it's wired I don't need to worry? Ugh, sorry :(
response: Headset is wireless. Does not have to be plugged into console in order to hear sound. The headset comes with the adapter for Xbox One controller, but chat does not work with Xbox 360. No batteries or charging required

context: Are there more buttons on the right-hand side of the mouse or just the two on the left that are next to where the thumb rests?
response: Button list : Left click, Right click, Left side buttons, Right side buttons, Middle click, and Middle button (Middle button makes sensitivity ultra fast)(Both sets of side buttons can be remapped using steel series's software)

context: can single person play game
response: Yes, and I recommend this game highly...  Awesome!!!

context: is there a separate volume button for chat sound and game sound?
response: That's my biggest issue with this headset. I can never hear people in chat, the game sound drowns them out. I've tried selecting chat then trying volume but it's just the master volume. Makes these headphones really frustrating.

context: where is the link to download the program that helps it run
response: It comes with a disc with the drivers. Also I used google to find generic controller drivers for my other computer that doesn't have a disc drive. Beware though, the controller only works right with a few games. I had to return it.

context: Is getting stuck in a dark building part of the game ? because i can't get out.
response: No that's not part of the game........seems to do with video problem.

context: waht kinde of remote can you use for this game the classic controller pro?????????
response: you can use the regular control with the nunchuck or you can use the one that is hand held with buttons.

context: Do you have to have xbox to play these or can they be used as just drums?
response: No, unfortunately not. They are designed for the Xbox system only. However, if you wanted to practice sticking, or just even banging on the drums, you could. This set only works for Rockband on Xbox 360.

context: I have Swap force already...do i need to buy the starter kit for dark edition game or do I just need the game??
response: Dark edition is just for the special characters, its the same game and same portal, just comes with the 5 special Dark Skylander characters

context: Does this come with a controller?
response: Yes. The system comes with a controller. I hope this information helps.

context: I own the standard edition, but a friend of mine is ordering the collector's edition. Is there a way for him to give me the extra content?
response: No they are bound to you

context: Can you play this with steam?
response: I have in steam account, so, you can play in steam.

context: Do you need xbox live to save?
response: No. You just need Xbox Live to play against other racers and post your special achievements.

context: Can you play using a game controller, or is it keyboard/mouse only?
response: you can use a game controller.That how I play the game.You will also like the game.

context: Is this something needed to go with an xbox 1?  I'm gift shopping.  And what is a kinect?
response: This mount is not something you need buy its great to have. Kinect is the sensor bar that comes a with the Xbox. It's a camera, motion sensor, and voice sensor. This mount just makes it easier to attach the kinect to the top of your tv

context: I lost my remote and my LG unit is 9000 BTU'a model number LP0910WNRY2 ...will this one work for that?
response: It should. I have a 10,000 btu and a 15,000 btu LG AC's and it works on both of mine.

context: Does it comes with Netflix?
response: Netflix will be preinstalled, but you have to log in or make a new account. New accounts will get a 1 month free trial.  Service is 8.99 a month for streaming video.

context: what is the difference between card and online game code?
response: Online game code is instant and you can start playing, if you get the card you have to wait for it to arrive then play.

context: Is this Mouse for palm handed grips or Claw handed grips?
response: I find it supports the claw grip better, but it wouldn't be a bad mouse for a palm grip.

context: it stops working for no reason. Where I can fix it?
response: I've had the same problem.  Tried going to website of manufacturer and downloaded the drivers and software and still have the problem.  Aside from the occasional hang up at the worst possible time, it works fine.

context: Is this keyboard Mac compatible?
response: No, this is a Windows PC keyboard only.

context: Does this work with the wii?
response: I'm not 100% sure but I don't think so,  But I do know that it works really well on my 17 year old son's laptop!! He enjoys it immensely!  But I'm not sure how he got those games on his laptop,  Well, I hope I was of some help for you!

context: work with xbox 4g?
response: Yeah it fit perfect in my 4gb. Was able to load up my Battlefield 4 in a matter of minutes

context: Does it increase the stock battery life?
response: I would not say that, but it did return the GB to its original battery life. I can use mine for a few days now without having to charge it, probably playing 4-5 hours a day. Absolutely worth picking up.

context: If I've never played a Fire Emblem game, will I still understand/enjoy this game?
response: Yes this game is easy to understand for new and old gamers the the Fire emblem series and the new relationship system really makes it interesting.

context: CM Storm QuickFire TK or Corsair Vengeance K70
response: You can't really compare the two when one is a ten keyless (quickfire tk)  and the other is a full size keyboard (k70). Both are great keyboards.

context: How long is this  campaign?
response: If you play non-stop, then it's about 6 to 7 hours. It is much easier than Crysis 2. It's an excellent game but the 1st one was a lot better.

context: Is QB Pro 2013 with enhanced payroll offered for multi user license for 2 users
response: Yes but an additional license is required. It's either 1 user or 3

context: Can you play this game on a regular wii?
response: No you can't.  It's specific for the Wii U.

context: The playstation plus comes in the box?
response: When I bought the Killzone Bundle the PS+ came in the box.

context: do i have to be on the internet to install port royale 3 pc game
response: I honestly didn't pay any attention, as I am connected to the internet all the time.  But I don't recall seeing any messages that mentioned this requirement.

context: is the DCL on disk or is it code??
response: Brand new CD so you can get rid of your other one. :D

context: does it work under Windows 8.1?
response: I had the same problem it wasn't working with Windows 8.1 then I realized that my xbox 360 picked up on the controller from the other side of the house so I unplugged my xbox 360 and now it's working with the computer.

context: does this work for X1'S
response: I just read Matts response. To clarify, this cord is a replacement if ur headphone cord is broken. if u have the x1s or the x11s my response still applies. Neither one of those have the detachable headphone cord like the 41s. You can use any of the headsets on xb1 as long as you have the adapter.

context: What is instant access? Is it like getting the digital code?  Will the same code work for Xbox Juan?
response: It is getting a digital code and this version(for PC) will not work for Xbox. There is also a Xbox version of instant access on Amazon I believe.
